mapper.select: SELECT PROJ_BD_ID , WRITER , PROJ_BD_TITLE , PROJ_BD_WRITE_DATE FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM RN , A.PROJ_BD_ID , A.WRITER , A.PROJ_BD_TITLE , A.PROJ_BD_WRITE_DATE FROM( SELECT PROJ_BD_ID , WRITER , PROJ_BD_TITLE , PROJ_BD_WRITE_DATE FROM PROJ_BD WHERE PROJ_ID = 'P003' AND DELETE_YN = 'n' ORDER BY PROJ_BD_ID ASC) A ) WHERE RN > ( #{pageNum} - 1 ) * #{amount} AND RN <= #{pageNum} * #{amount}
SELECT COUNT(PROJ_BD_ID) FROM PROJ_BD WHERE PROJ_ID = 'P003'
SELECT PROJ_BD_ID , WRITER , PROJ_ID , PROJ_BD_TITLE , PROJ_BD_CTS , PROJ_BD_WRITE_DATE , DELETE_YN FROM PROJ_BD WHERE PROJ_BD_ID = #{projBdId}
mapper.insert:
